scripts.build: npm run clean && concurrently "npm run build:client" "npm run build:server" && npm run build:copy
scripts.pack: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder
scripts.dist:win: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --linux
